persona.name: Dr Hargrave Quennington Beauregard IV
persona.public_role: Professor at Columbia, hosts 'Mystery, Mayhem & Mint Juleps' on PBS.
persona.secret_or_twist: May have no magic at all—just wit and charm.

persona.name: Jordan Lumberpond
persona.archetype: Indie folk icon turned Grammy-winning pop star
persona.public_role: Known for soulful ballads, protest anthems, silence during 2024 Brand Wars.
persona.invitation_reason: Lyrics influence millions—CC wants to license that influence.

U08N3LH5BCL.backstory_notes: Origins: • Grew Up In Appalachia to a Large Farming Family • Fell in Love With Music When He Saw a Traveling Band at the County Fair as a Child • Learned Banjo & Fiddle From Those County Fair Bands & Started Traveling When He Was Young • Was a Natural Born Talent, But His Agent Told Him He Had to Change His Sound to Make it Big. • Joined a Boy Band & Traveled With Them For Several Years, Loosing His Roots & Soul In The Process. • After the Band Disbanned, He Tried Going Solo and Was Moderately Successful, But Petered Out. • Now He’s a Washed Up Hazbin Who Makes Just Enough Money Playing and Doing Stand Up in Hole In The Wall Bars to Feed His Alcoholism. Motivations: • He’ll Do Anything to Gain the Attention of Others, Whether it Be Good or Bad • He’s Constantly Chasing New Things to Give Him The High He Once Felt as a Performer. Flaws: • Functioning Alcoholic • Overconfident, Arrogant, Prideful

persona.name: Ingrid Tienfjorg
persona.archetype: Global activist, Nobel laureate, enemy of corporate greenwashing
persona.public_role: Founder of WorldHarmony, cross-planar social justice coalition.
persona.invitation_reason: Her moral clarity could ruin or legitimize CC’s plans.
persona.secret_or_twist: Believes in redemption… even for CC.

persona.name: Vaultsy
persona.public_role: Allegedly a myth, but viral videos are real. Latest stunt: vanishing the Statue of Liberty’s torch.
persona.invitation_reason: Art destabilizes narrative—and Vaultsy’s black-market mystique undermines the aesthetics of consumer control.
persona.secret_or_twist: Secretly a group? An AI? Next heist: Wikipedia.

persona.name: Winifred Goopington
persona.archetype: Wellness mogul, spiritual grifter, mystic celeb
persona.public_role: Founder of Goop&Glow, selling enlightenment crystals to sentient probiotics.
persona.invitation_reason: Already sells narratives—CC wants to franchise her belief system.
persona.secret_or_twist: Might have achieved enlightenment… but mostly placebo.

U08N91YNS20.backstory_notes: I discovered my gift by making candles at home with a glass of wine. I was watching the Real Housedruids of Paladin and wanted to make a candle to make my private parts more pretty. As I was watching some of the druids fight over dumb rich things, my eyes rolled back and the candle started to glow. It enchanted EVEYRTHING in the room if you know what I mean. Since then Ive grown this into a huge business. Self - Improvement: I want to use my empire as a way to cure all wounds, but only ones that arent necessarily moral, and really more non-essential to the normal person. However, vanity can morph into confidence, and that confidence can shape the way you live your life forever! Flaw: I am a pretty blunt person! I tell it how it is even if its a secret thats supposed to be sacred. Although charming at times, it does become problematic!

persona.name: Colm Cassidy
persona.archetype: Code poet, heartsick artificer, mad genius
persona.invitation_reason: The Creator needs not an invitation to his own event.
